performUpkeep(bytes).details: the chainlink keeper nodes monitor the checkUpKepp function when the function returns  true this function gets executed  the condition specified are met  for this case the conditons are the election must be active , participants must exist  the funds must exist and the time must be exhausted for the lottery

acceptOwnership().notice: Allows an ownership transfer to be completed by the recipient.

setCoordinator(address).notice: Sets the VRF Coordinator addressThis method should only be callable by the coordinator or contract owner

transferOwnership(address).notice: Allows an owner to begin transferring ownership to a new address.
